duties_responsibilities.duty: Manufacture and package medical device instruments and components while maintaining product quality and optimal product flow.
Follow written procedures and verbal instructions for the assigned production operations required in the manufacturing and packaging of medical devices.
Inspect work to ensure parts comply with specifications using basic hand tools and measuring/test equipment.
Participate in cross-training programs as required by Team Captain/Coordinator.
Adhere to established Quality System Policies and procedures as instructed in the training process.
Follow all safety protocols, housekeeping, utilize appropriate safety equipment and PPE, and report safety issues and improvements proactively.
Uphold established lean manufacturing principles and tools used on the production floor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required.
Manufacturing experience in a Medical Device environment preferred.
Understanding of Good Manufacturing and Good Documentation practices a plus.
